verses.verse: And I <WG2504>, brethren <WG80>, when I came <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>, came <WG2064> not <WG3756> with <WG2596> excellency <WG5247> of speech <WG3056> or <WG2228> of wisdom <WG4678>, declaring <WG2605> unto you <WG5213> the testimony <WG3142> of God <WG2316>.
